message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset.  This product is worth at least $800000 to me, and I believe it has the potential to be even more valuable in the right hands. I'm offering it to you for $900000.  This price reflects its inherent value and the potential upside it offers. I understand this is a significant investment, but I believe it will be a wise one. Let me know if you'd like to discuss the details further.
